Pinyin1: wǒ xǐhuan chī là de ， yóuqí shì huǒguō 。
Chinese1: 我喜欢吃辣的，尤其是火锅。
Translate1: I like spicy food, especially hot pot.

Pinyin1: wǒmen jiā xíguàn zǎocān hēzhōu 。
Chinese1: 我们家习惯早餐喝粥。
Translate1: Our family is used to having porridge for breakfast.

Pinyin1: wǒmen kěyǐ diǎn yífèn kǎochuàn ma ？
Chinese1: 我们可以点一份烤串吗？
Translate1: Can we order some grilled skewers?

Pinyin1: qǐngwèn zhège shì yǒujī de ma ？
Chinese1: 请问这个是有机的吗？
Translate1: Is this organic?

Pinyin1: nǐmen jiǔdiàn yǒu miǎnfèi de zǎocān ma ？
Chinese1: 你们酒店有免费的早餐吗？
Translate1: Do you offer free breakfast at your hotel?

Pinyin1: wǒ xiǎng yùdìng yījiàn shuāngrénfáng 。
Chinese1: 我想预订一间双人房。
Translate1: I would like to book a double room.

Pinyin1: wǒ xūyào yīgè ānjìng de fángjiān 。
Chinese1: 我需要一个安静的房间。
Translate1: I need a quiet room.

Pinyin1: qǐngwèn zhè dàocài yǒuméiyǒu jiā huājiāo ？
Chinese1: 请问这道菜有没有加花椒？
Translate1: Is there any pepper in this dish?

Pinyin1: wǒmen yàodiǎn yífèn kǎoròu bàn fàn 。
Chinese1: 我们要点一份烤肉拌饭。
Translate1: We'll have grilled meat with rice.

Pinyin1: qǐngwèn zhè dàocài yǒuméiyǒu jiātáng ？
Chinese1: 请问这道菜有没有加糖？
Translate1: Is there any sugar in this dish?

Pinyin1: wǒmen yàodiǎn yífèn mápódòufǔ 。
Chinese1: 我们要点一份麻婆豆腐。
Translate1: We'll have Mapo tofu.

Pinyin1: zhège páizi de chéngfèn ānquán ma ？
Chinese1: 这个牌子的成分安全吗？
Translate1: Are the ingredients of this brand safe?

Pinyin1: wǒmen yàodiǎn yífèn hóngshāoròu 。
Chinese1: 我们要点一份红烧肉。
Translate1: We'll have braised pork.

Pinyin1: qǐngwèn zhè dàocài yǒuméiyǒu jiācù ？
Chinese1: 请问这道菜有没有加醋？
Translate1: Is there any vinegar in this dish?

Pinyin1: nǐmen yǒuméiyǒu sònghuò fúwù ？
Chinese1: 你们有没有送货服务？
Translate1: Do you have delivery service?

Pinyin1: nǐ xǐhuan chī làjiāo ma ？
Chinese1: 你喜欢吃辣椒吗？
Translate1: Do you like chili peppers?

Pinyin1: qǐngwèn zhè dàocài yǒuméiyǒu jiā làjiāo ？
Chinese1: 请问这道菜有没有加辣椒？
Translate1: Is there any chili pepper in this dish?

Pinyin1: wǒmen yàodiǎn yífèn kǎojī tuǐ 。
Chinese1: 我们要点一份烤鸡腿。
Translate1: We'll have grilled chicken legs.

Pinyin1: zhè dàocài de kǒugǎn hěn qīngshuǎng 。
Chinese1: 这道菜的口感很清爽。
Translate1: The texture of this dish is very refreshing.

Pinyin1: qǐngwèn zhè dàocài yǒuméiyǒu jiā mógu ？
Chinese1: 请问这道菜有没有加蘑菇？
Translate1: Is there any mushroom in this dish?

Pinyin1: wǒmen yàodiǎn yífèn kǎoyāròu bǐng 。
Chinese1: 我们要点一份烤鸭肉饼。
Translate1: We'll have grilled duck meat patty.

Pinyin1: nǐ xǐhuan chī shūcài ma ？
Chinese1: 你喜欢吃蔬菜吗？
Translate1: Do you like vegetables?

Pinyin1: nǐ yào mǎi shénme ？
Chinese1: 你要买什么？
Translate1: What do you want to buy?

Pinyin1: qǐngwèn zhè dàocài yǒuméiyǒu jiājiāng ？
Chinese1: 请问这道菜有没有加姜？
Translate1: Is there any ginger in this dish?

Pinyin1: wǒmen yàodiǎn yífèn zhàjīchì 。
Chinese1: 我们要点一份炸鸡翅。
Translate1: We'll have fried chicken wings.

Pinyin1: zhège pǐnpái de zhìliàng zěnmeyàng ？
Chinese1: 这个品牌的质量怎么样？
Translate1: How is the quality of this brand?

Pinyin1: nǐmen jiēshòu xìnyòngkǎ ma ？
Chinese1: 你们接受信用卡吗？
Translate1: Do you accept credit cards?

Pinyin1: wǒ kěyǐ yòng zhīfùbǎo fùkuǎn ma ？
Chinese1: 我可以用支付宝付款吗？
Translate1: Can I pay with Alipay?

Pinyin1: zhèjiā cāntīng de fúwùyuán hěn rèqíng 。
Chinese1: 这家餐厅的服务员很热情。
Translate1: The waiters at this restaurant are very enthusiastic.

Pinyin1: qǐngwèn zhège yǒu bǎozhìqī ma ？
Chinese1: 请问这个有保质期吗？
Translate1: Does this have an expiration date?

Pinyin1: wǒyào mǎi yīxiē miànbāo 。
Chinese1: 我要买一些面包。
Translate1: I want to buy some bread.

Pinyin1: nǐmen yǒuméiyǒu dǎzhé de xiézi ？
Chinese1: 你们有没有打折的鞋子？
Translate1: Do you have any discounted shoes?

Pinyin1: wǒ kěyǐ tuìhuò ma ？
Chinese1: 我可以退货吗？
Translate1: Can I return this?

Pinyin1: zhège páizi de xiàoguǒ zěnmeyàng ？
Chinese1: 这个牌子的效果怎么样？
Translate1: How effective is this brand?

Pinyin1: nǐmen yǒuméiyǒu yōuhuìhuódòng ？
Chinese1: 你们有没有优惠活动？
Translate1: Do you have any promotional activities?

Chinese1: 我要买一些洗发水。

Chinese1: 这个产品有没有试用装？
Translate1: Does this product have a trial size?

Pinyin1: wǒmen kěyǐ diǎn yífèn mápódòufǔ ma ？
Chinese1: 我们可以点一份麻婆豆腐吗？
Translate1: Can we order a plate of Mapo tofu?

Pinyin1: zhèjiā cāntīng de càidān hěnquán 。
Chinese1: 这家餐厅的菜单很全。
Translate1: The menu at this restaurant is very comprehensive.

Pinyin1: wǒmen kěyǐ diǎn yífèn zhájī ma ？
Chinese1: 我们可以点一份炸鸡吗？
Translate1: Can we order a plate of fried chicken?

Pinyin1: zhège xiǎochītān de kǎochuàn hěn hǎochī 。
Chinese1: 这个小吃摊的烤串很好吃。
Translate1: The grilled skewers at this street vendor are delicious.

Pinyin1: wǒmen xūyào zhǎodào gēnghǎo de fúwù 。
Chinese1: 我们需要找到更好的服务。
Translate1: We need to find better service.

Pinyin1: nǐ xǐhuan chī là de shíwù ma ？
Chinese1: 你喜欢吃辣的食物吗？
Translate1: Do you like spicy food?

Pinyin1: zhè dàocài de wèidao hěn tèbié 。
Chinese1: 这道菜的味道很特别。
Translate1: The taste of this dish is very unique.

Pinyin1: wǒ zuì xǐhuan de zhōngcān shì kǎoyā 。
Chinese1: 我最喜欢的中餐是烤鸭。
Translate1: My favorite Chinese dish is roast duck.

Pinyin1: wǒmen xūyào bǎ mǎtǒngshuā yīxià 。
Chinese1: 我们需要把马桶刷一下。
Translate1: We need to clean the toilet.

Pinyin1: zhège xiǎochītān de tánghúlu hěn hàochī 。
Chinese1: 这个小吃摊的糖葫芦很好吃。
Translate1: The candied hawthorn at this street vendor is delicious.

Pinyin1: nǐ xǐhuan chīhǎixiān ma ？
Chinese1: 你喜欢吃海鲜吗？
Translate1: Do you like seafood?

Pinyin1: nǐ xǐhuan chī tángguǒ ma ？
Chinese1: 你喜欢吃糖果吗？
Translate1: Do you like candy?

Pinyin1: zhège xiǎochītān de jiān jiǎo hěn hàochī 。
Chinese1: 这个小吃摊的煎饺很好吃。
Translate1: The pan-fried dumplings at this street vendor are delicious.

Pinyin1: qǐngwèn zhè dàocài yǒuméiyǒu jiā dòufu ？
Chinese1: 请问这道菜有没有加豆腐？
Translate1: Is there any tofu in this dish?

Pinyin1: wǒmen yàodiǎn yífèn kǎoniúròu 。
Chinese1: 我们要点一份烤牛肉。
Translate1: We'll have grilled beef.

Pinyin1: wǒmen kěyǐ diǎn yífèn kǎoyú ma ？
Chinese1: 我们可以点一份烤鱼吗？

Pinyin1: zhè dàocài de kǒugǎn hěn hǎo 。
Chinese1: 这道菜的口感很好。
Translate1: The texture of this dish is very good.

Chinese1: 我们可以点一份糖醋排骨吗？
Translate1: Can we order a plate of sweet and sour pork ribs?

Pinyin1: zhèjiā cāntīng de huánjìng hěn shūshì 。
Chinese1: 这家餐厅的环境很舒适。
Translate1: The atmosphere at this restaurant is very comfortable.

Pinyin1: wǒmen xūyào jiābān ma ？
Chinese1: 我们需要加班吗？
Translate1: Do we need to work overtime?

Pinyin1: nǐ néng bāng wǒ ānpái yīxià chūchāi xíngchéng ma ？

Translate1: Can you help me arrange the business trip itinerary?

Pinyin1: nǐ juéde zhège dìfāng xūyào xiāodú ma ？
Chinese1: 你觉得这个地方需要消毒吗？
Translate1: Do you think this area needs to be disinfected?

Pinyin1: jīntiān zǎoshang dǔchē le ， wǒ chídào le 。
Chinese1: 今天早上堵车了，我迟到了。
Translate1: There was traffic jam this morning, I was late.

Pinyin1: nǐ xǐhuan chī gāodiǎn ma ？
Chinese1: 你喜欢吃糕点吗？
Translate1: Do you like pastries?

Pinyin1: zhè dàocài de wèidao hěn qīngdàn 。
Chinese1: 这道菜的味道很清淡。
Translate1: The taste of this dish is very light.

Pinyin1: wǒmen kěyǐ diǎn yífèn suāncàiyú ma ？
Chinese1: 我们可以点一份酸菜鱼吗？
Translate1: Can we order a plate of fish with pickled vegetables?

Pinyin1: zhèjiā cāntīng de huánjìng hěn yǒu qíngdiào 。
Chinese1: 这家餐厅的环境很有情调。
Translate1: The atmosphere at this restaurant is very romantic.

Pinyin1: qǐngwèn zhè dàocài yǒuméiyǒu jiā xīhóngshì ？
Chinese1: 请问这道菜有没有加西红柿？
Translate1: Is there any tomato in this dish?

Pinyin1: wǒmen yàodiǎn yífèn kǎo jīxiōngròu fàn 。
Chinese1: 我们要点一份烤鸡胸肉饭。
Translate1: We'll have grilled chicken breast with rice.

Pinyin1: qǐngwèn zhè dàocài yǒuméiyǒu jiā yángcōng ？
Chinese1: 请问这道菜有没有加洋葱？
Translate1: Is there any onion in this dish?

Pinyin1: wǒmen kěyǐ zuò gōngjiāochē qù shìzhōngxīn 。
Chinese1: 我们可以坐公交车去市中心。
Translate1: We can take the bus to the city center.

Pinyin1: wǒmen xūyào bǎ shuǐcáo qīngxǐ yīxià 。
Chinese1: 我们需要把水槽清洗一下。
Translate1: We need to clean the sink.

Pinyin1: zhèjiā cāntīng de jiàgé hěn hélǐ 。
Chinese1: 这家餐厅的价格很合理。
Translate1: The prices at this restaurant are very reasonable.

Pinyin1: nǐ xǐhuan chī miàntiáo ma ？
Chinese1: 你喜欢吃面条吗？
Translate1: Do you like noodles?

Pinyin1: zhège xiǎochītān de kǎojī chì hěn hàochī 。
Chinese1: 这个小吃摊的烤鸡翅很好吃。
Translate1: The grilled chicken wings at this street vendor are delicious.

Pinyin1: wǒmen kěyǐ diǎn yífèn hóngshāoròu ma ？
Chinese1: 我们可以点一份红烧肉吗？
Translate1: Can we order a plate of braised pork?

Pinyin1: wǒmen xūyào yīgè xiéguì láifàng xiézi 。
Chinese1: 我们需要一个鞋柜来放鞋子。
Translate1: We need a shoe cabinet to put our shoes in.

Pinyin1: zhège qiángshàng de huà hěn yǒu yìshù gǎn 。
Chinese1: 这个墙上的画很有艺术感。
Translate1: The painting on this wall is very artistic.

Pinyin1: nǐ juéde zhège shāfā zěnmeyàng ？
Chinese1: 你觉得这个沙发怎么样？
Translate1: What do you think of this sofa?

Pinyin1: wǒmen xūyào yīzhāng dà zhuōzi láifàng diànshì 。
Chinese1: 我们需要一张大桌子来放电视。
Translate1: We need a big table to put the TV on.

Pinyin1: qǐngwèn zhè dàocài yǒuméiyǒu jiā jiàngyóu ？
Chinese1: 请问这道菜有没有加酱油？
Translate1: Is there any soy sauce in this dish?

Pinyin1: wǒmen yàodiǎn yífèn kǎoyú 。
Chinese1: 我们要点一份烤鱼。
Translate1: We'll have grilled fish.

Pinyin1: zhège dēngguāng hěn róuhé ， hěn shìhé wòshì 。
Chinese1: 这个灯光很柔和，很适合卧室。
Translate1: This light is very soft, perfect for the bedroom.

Pinyin1: nǐ juéde zhège dìfāng xūyào cāshì ma ？
Chinese1: 你觉得这个地方需要擦拭吗？
Translate1: Do you think this area needs to be wiped?

Pinyin1: wǒmen xūyào zài zhège lùkǒu děng hóngdēng 。
Chinese1: 我们需要在这个路口等红灯。
Translate1: We need to wait for the red light at this intersection.

Pinyin1: tángcùpáigǔ shì wǒ zuì xǐhuan de cài 。
Chinese1: 糖醋排骨是我最喜欢的菜。
Translate1: Sweet and sour pork ribs are my favorite dish.

Pinyin1: chǎofàn shì fēicháng shòuhuānyíng de kuàicān 。
Chinese1: 炒饭是非常受欢迎的快餐。
Translate1: Fried rice is a very popular fast food.

Pinyin1: zhōuwǔ huì yǒu yīcì jùcān 。

Translate1: There will be a potluck on Friday.

Pinyin1: wǒmen xūyào zài zhège zhàntái děng dìtiě 。
Chinese1: 我们需要在这个站台等地铁。
Translate1: We need to wait for the subway at this platform.

Pinyin1: wǒmen kěyǐ zuò gāotiě qù lìng yīgè chéngshì 。

Translate1: We can take the high-speed train to another city.

Pinyin1: zhège dìtiězhàn de chūkǒu zài nǎlǐ ？

Pinyin1: wǒmen xūyào zài zhège chēzhàn huànchéng 。

Translate1: Can we order a plate of fried noodles?

Chinese1: 我们可以试穿这件衣服吗？
Translate1: Can we try on this piece of clothing?

Chinese1: 我们需要找一个更好的尺码。
Translate1: We need to find a better size.

Pinyin1: zhège shāngpǐn yǒu bǎoxiū ma ？
Chinese1: 这个商品有保修吗？
Translate1: Does this item have a warranty?

Pinyin1: nǐ chángshì guò málàhuǒguō ma ？
Chinese1: 你尝试过麻辣火锅吗？

Chinese1: 我可以试试吗？

Pinyin1: qǐngwèn zhège shì wúyóu de ma ？

Pinyin1: zhège páizi de chéngfèn ānquán ma ？
Chinese1: 这个牌子的成分安全吗？
